short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension which lets you shoot an arrow onto amazon products to put them into your basket.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will send you back to the old stone age where you have to hunt for your resources. Instead of seeing a simple "add to basket" button on Amazon, you will now find a digital bow and arrow. Once you hit it, after long pressing and releasing, your desired object that will be sent to your shopping card. 

This extension is a tribute to Christian Jankowski art performance "Die Jagd" from 1992.
